name: part_000
file: tmp_【#不知火フレア生誕祭LIVE】遅れてやってきた私の誕生日LIVE！【不知火フレア⧸ホロライブ】 [H1vf2vF1LmE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_000.mov

scenes.description: The opening image of Shiranui Flare's Birthday Live 2022, featuring various Hololive members in a celebratory illustration.
Shiranui Flare performs the song 'JOINT' on a high-tech stage with impressive light, fire, and screen effects.

subtitles.original: #不知火フレア生誕祭LIVE
subtitles.english: #ShiranuiFlareBirthdayLive

subtitles.original: 不知火フレア Birthday LIVE 2022
subtitles.english: Shiranui Flare Birthday Live 2022

subtitles.original: JOINT
subtitles.english: JOINT

subtitles.original: 作詞 川田まみ 作曲 中沢伴行
subtitles.english: Lyrics: Mami Kawada / Composition: Tomoyuki Nakazawa

subtitles.original: 映し出してみた世界は
subtitles.english: The world I saw reflected

subtitles.original: 塵と残像の淡い影
subtitles.english: Faint shadows of dust and afterimages

subtitles.original: 凛とした背中には
subtitles.english: On that dignified back

subtitles.original: そのすべてを背負う覚悟がある
subtitles.english: Is the resolve to shoulder it all

subtitles.original: どうしたいの?
subtitles.english: What do you want to do?

subtitles.original: そうして
subtitles.english: Do it like that

subtitles.original: 孤独な旅路をそう 決めたはずだったのに
subtitles.english: Even though I should have decided on a lonely journey

subtitles.original: この手を離さないで
subtitles.english: Don't let go of this hand

subtitles.original: 君から伝わる想いから
subtitles.english: From the feelings that come from you

subtitles.original: 心に眠る願いが目覚める
subtitles.english: The wishes sleeping in my heart awaken

subtitles.original: 強い視線の彼方
subtitles.english: Beyond that strong gaze

subtitles.original: 迷いない二人の姿が見える
subtitles.english: I can see the forms of two without hesitation

subtitles.original: だから進むの さらなる時へ
subtitles.english: So let's move forward, to a further time

subtitles.original: 砕けてく風景に
subtitles.english: In the shattering scenery

subtitles.original: 生きることの軌跡を知る
subtitles.english: I learn the trajectory of living

subtitles.original: 特別な意味求め
subtitles.english: Seeking a special meaning

subtitles.original: 彷徨い歩く道なき道を
subtitles.english: A pathless path walked while wandering

subtitles.original: 信じたいの
subtitles.english: I want to believe

subtitles.original: 信じて
subtitles.english: Believe

subtitles.original: ともに行くと そう決めて欲しかったから
subtitles.english: Because I wanted you to decide to go together

subtitles.original: 瞳をそらさないで
subtitles.english: Don't look away

subtitles.original: うまく言葉にできないけど
subtitles.english: I can't put it into words well, but

subtitles.original: 胸の深く君を求めている
subtitles.english: Deep in my heart, I am seeking you

subtitles.original: 希望の遥か彼方
subtitles.english: Far beyond hope

subtitles.original: 迷いない二人の姿が見える
subtitles.english: I can see the forms of two without hesitation

subtitles.original: だから進むの 次なる場所へ
subtitles.english: So let's move forward, to the next place

subtitles.original: 悔しさや悲しみが
subtitles.english: Regret and sadness

subtitles.original: 今までそれ以上の喜びを教えてくれた
subtitles.english: Taught me joys even greater than those until now

subtitles.original: そして隣にいつも
subtitles.english: And always by my side

subtitles.original: 必ず君という存在があるということも
subtitles.english: There is always the fact that you exist

subtitles.original: 感じるでしょ もう何も怖くない
subtitles.english: You feel it, right? I'm not afraid of anything anymore
